author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

More Alpaka and ROCm-related updates:
  - add `PortableTestObjects` data formats for the ROCm Alpaka backend
  - add support for AMD GPUs via the `ProcessAcceleratorROCm`
  - update the description of the "backend" parameter
  - introduce different exit status codes for `cudaIsEnabled` and `rocmIsEnabled`
  - Split the CUDA and ROCm service into "enabled" and "disabled" versions
  - do not load the CUDA or ROCm services if the backends are not available
  - remove the explicit `CUDAService` from the HLT configuration, and rely on `ProcessAcceleratorCUDA` to load it if necessary

#### PR validation:

All unit tests should pass.

#### Backport status

Backport of #40832 to CMSSW 13.0.x for data taking.
title: More Alpaka and ROCm-related updates [13.0.x]
